title: CCI approves Punjab State Power Corpâ€™s takeover of GVK Energy arm
description: The anti-trust regulator said PSPCL, a fully owned undertaking of the Punjab government, intends to take over GVK Power (Goindwal Sahib), which has been undergoing an insolvency resolution process. PSPCL has reportedly offered Rs 1,400 crore to lenders for the acquisition of the GVK power unit. This is the first such takeover of a private electricity generator by a state-run distribution company.
